comment: Some people stay for a reason, some for a season, and some for a lifetime! Wishing all the best to a wonderful person at heart. Always keep your drive alive, but sometimes, also do let the butterfly come and sit on your shoulder. P.s. Your achievement on campus: Being able to distort my sleep cycle!

comment: Can't forget those deep talks in the countless campus walks, day outs, night-outs, adventures, and, of course, those beautiful sunrise walks. Props to you for making my days awesome and changing me for the better. Rooting for you for life! P.s. Sometimes, believe in yourself & take a leap of faith.

comment:

comment: Hey study partner, really enjoyed all those study sessions with you. You are such an innocent and nonchalant soul.
